word:
God desires us to learn from nature the lesson of obedience. 

     "Ask now the beasts, and they shall teach thee; 
      And the birds of the heavens, and they shall tell thee: 
      Or speak to the earth, and it shall teach thee; 
                                                                           328

      And the fishes of the sea shall declare unto thee. 
      Who knoweth not in all these, 
      That the hand of Jehovah hath wrought?" 
     "With God is wisdom and might; 
      He hath counsel and understanding." Job 12:7-9, 13, A. R. V. 


     "Blessed is the man" whose "delight is in the law of 
                Jehovah. . . .
      He shall be like a tree planted by the streams of water, 
      That bringeth forth its fruit in its season, 
      Whose leaf also doth not wither; 
      And whatsoever he doeth shall prosper." Psalm 1:1-3, A. R. V.
